cn.edu.jxau.image.rw
类 BMP

java.lang.Object
  cn.edu.jxau.image.rw.ReadImage
      cn.edu.jxau.image.rw.BMP

public class BMP
extends ReadImage

This class provides a public static method that tkes an InputStream to a Windows .bmp file and converts it into an ImageProducer via a MemoryImageSource. You can fetch a .bmp throough a URL with the following code: URL url = new URL() Image img= createImage(BMPReader.getBMPImage(url.openStream()));
